website_summaries.verdict: A versatile table lamp and speaker that's perfect for a nursery or child's room. Also a good choice for a simple yet modern desk or tabletop.
pros: Attractive and practical, thanks to the table-top lamp design that produces soft lighting (choice of warm or cool white) and decent sound
Light is adjustable and has 3 brightness levels
Doesn't take up a lot of space and its design fits with most decor
cons: Occasional syncing issues and drop connectivity
A few faulty speakers that failed to work after a short time of use

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids room as a night light and Bluetooth speaker for lullabies. Before I could get it hung up, I sat it on their night stand and it fell over and the top white plastic part of the bird fell and separated from the bottom clear part of the bird. I assumed it would snap back together but it did not. It was broke that easily. It looks nice and is a nice concept but is not made very well so I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The music from my phone sounds really great coming out of it. The only thing I don’t like is I can’t seem to figure out how to turn it off when I when I want to stop playing the music. Or instance I know I can turn my phone off and stop hearing the music but if I go out to my car and I want to listen to it it’s still only place in the house on the songbird
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, EXCELLENT sound and illumination!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product! It’s lightweight, lights up a good portion of the room even though it is rather small (I love that about it too!), the sound is surprisingly good! Like, really good! Syncs to Bluetooth with ease. I want to get another one for work! It’s perfect! It even came with a free gift! A little USB portable fan. BUY THIS! It’s a great gift for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but found it a little bit confusing how to set up at first (even with my technological good sense). Still, the light is what I bought it for, being wireless and all, and it has nice brightness and color settings. Great for a reading light on your headboard or night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Critelli

customer_reviews.title: Good size, but very white bright light
customer_reviews.text: Size is similar to photos, but light is bright white- not warm or yellow toned like description or photos of product. There is also a tone that sounds each time you power it on with no way to turn it off. Charging cable included, but no power "brick" so you need a separate one or charge it by USB port-wish I had noticed that in the description that beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get it to play music.
customer_reviews.text: Lamp itself is great, but that is is. It will not play music for me no matter what I do.
customer_reviews.author: OW

customer_reviews.title: Book light
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! The only negative is it's very dim, even on the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Without charger it does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Like others who recently purchased this item, mine arrived without a charging cable, although it specifically says that it comes with a charging cable. I found a charging cable in my house, but it does not seem to work. So now I have a paper weight. Taking suggestions, because otherwise I really love this little light.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia S. Knopf

customer_reviews.title: this thing is so adorable
customer_reviews.text: and i bought one for my daughter in law for Christmas as well and everyone LOVED it and now wants one of thier own! provides a generous amount of light
customer_reviews.author: laura briguglio

customer_reviews.title: Plays music really nicely. Immediately played Jefferson Airplane's Volunteers
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, only problem is that even keeping it plugged in, it interferes with my ear piece, so I have to completely turn the bluetooth off when not in use. Plays music really nicely. Immediately played Jefferson Airplane's Volunteers,
customer_reviews.author: Fara

customer_reviews.title: Great for my wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. I am not the biggest fan of the bluetooth.... I got caught playing Clash of Clans in another room :(
customer_reviews.author: William E. Schroeter

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We want a small light for a baby!
customer_reviews.author: TwoForTran

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursery
customer_reviews.text: Use this in baby’s nursery as it serves as a great nightlight. Three levels of brightness is convenient. Can play music and the charge lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Speaker is unbearably loud.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as a speaker because it is unbearably loud and has no volume adjustment. Light works as described but my son was pretty disappointed about the sound.
customer_reviews.author: I am Lord SnowBeGone

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and useful at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, sound and light that comes from this. I love that I can carry it room to room and even outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Burns

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Small but adorable. Would have perfered the light to be brighter but love it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Glow bird
customer_reviews.text: Love that it had 3 light settings. Sound quality is really good I was surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Lynch

customer_reviews.title: There is no more quality to say.
customer_reviews.text: As described, very satisfied. . Thank you, seller. The store has already been collected
customer_reviews.author: kathleen j lauwers

customer_reviews.title: The amount of light is perfect and I like that there are three different lighting ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use in my newborns room for late night changes. The amount of light is perfect and I like that there are three different lighting options, none of which are “too” bright. However, if the light is on the lowest setting, there is no way to simply turn the light off without going through the other brightnesses, which I think defeats the purpose. Also, when using the Bluetooth feature there is a constant flashing blue light. I’ve had to wrap something around the base of it. Last, I’ve found that a charge lasts about 2 days or so, only using it for changes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This adorable lamp is super light weight and portable
customer_reviews.text: This adorable lamp is super light weight and portable. The highest setting is a perfect brightness for reading while the lowest is a good nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: Cethlynn weatherly

customer_reviews.title: Longer cable needed.
customer_reviews.text: I need a longer charging cord. Anyone know the specs on the non usb side?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spooky behavior
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong color and the Bluetooth kept pinging in the middle of the night. It would also randomly make dial tone sounds. 2 spooky 4 me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet but battery needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet gadget but battery does not last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice brightness & size; speaker quality poor
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet little lamp, with great variation in the three brightnesses (the brightest is very bright indeed). The neck is adjustable without being either too stiff or too loose. Using it is easy, and it does run on battery for quite a long time. The speaker quality isn't good at all, though. About the same as built-in computer speakers. It'll be fine for music at bedtime or similar.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very good, cute lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is light, small, and easy to figure out. The warm light is nice as a reading lamp at night. Only drawbacks so far is that it only seems to have around 4 hours battery life, so having it on for a little while each night makes charging more frequent, and charging takes awhile. This could be avoided if one had an outlet near where they want the lamp, and then the cord could be plugged into an adapter for the wall.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little idea and if it works as well as I'm hoping it does, it will be amazing-especially for such a good price. We are still in the process of getting the nursery ready, so I haven't used it in it's full capacity yet and thus can't vouch completely for it. I did plug it in to charge a bit and the light worked perfectly-3 shades. It's also super bendy and durable seeming.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This light is so cute! Connects easily for bluetooth, the speaker is loud enough to fill a bedroom and the light is soft enough that it doesn't bother me before falling asleep (went with the warm white to help reduce the dreaded blue light before bedtime). I think I'm going to end up mounting this on the wall and getting another for the other side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp
customer_reviews.text: We have this lamp in our nursery for the baby and it's been great. I love that it has 3 different brightness settings and that you just tap to turn it on and/or increase brightness. The speaker is actually better quality than I thought it would be, sounds nice. Works great with our iPhones. And on top of working great and being so practical, it's darn cute.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is quite small, and doesn't provide a ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is quite small, and doesn't provide a very large radius of light, but it is cute, functional, and handy. Annoyances include the inability to turn down the volume of the beeping (for example, the low battery noise which seems to continue even once the lamp is charging), and the constantly flashing little blue light. The speaker isn't very high quality, but this is a twenty dollar lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Harper Atlantis

customer_reviews.title: Looks super cute on my changing table
customer_reviews.text: Looks super cute on my changing table, and the lowest setting provides the perfect amount of light for late night diaper changes when you don't want to get the baby too awake!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in NC

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much!!! The adjustable lighting is great! You can hang it on the wall wich is what I’ve done and I use it as a reading light above my bed in my small apartment. The sound quality isn’t the best but it’s not like I didn’t know that going in. This isn’t a bose.
customer_reviews.author: bakeyou

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: It is a good little lamp and perfect for task lighting. The only thing that I was disappointed about (I believe that I just misunderstood the description) was that this could be plugged into my desktop computer to be used as an external speaker. Unfortunately, it is Bluetooth only and so I cannot use it for this function.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N

customer_reviews.title: fantastic - I have two
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, portable, keeps a charge for a long time. And it's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bird lamp! Works and is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: happy2bshopping

customer_reviews.title: A great lamp
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this lamp. The bluetooth works great for a bedroom. It is really cute and has a nice soft light. Will buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: K.W

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Ot at all what I was expecting after reading the great reviews. Short battery life is a real thing with this. And even though I knew it was small, I never quite grasped how small it really was until I opened up the box.
customer_reviews.author: Diori J Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this little lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this little lamp! It comes with three different light settings and taps on an off. I'm using it in my daughter's nursery at night while feeding. It is perfect for the job as the lowest setting is not too bright. Holds a charge for several days of use. Plus it is really cute!
customer_reviews.author: MPack

customer_reviews.title: sound on speaker is great though!
customer_reviews.text: battery dies fast, and the white cover for the stand ripped within days with normal use. sound on speaker is great though!!
customer_reviews.author: LML

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little lamp, just right for nighttime baby or child's room.. So sweet!!
customer_reviews.author: Waldoh1

customer_reviews.title: This is shockingly useful. I use it as a portable nightlight
customer_reviews.text: This is shockingly useful. I use it as a portable nightlight. Great when feeding my baby and carrying used baby dishes and pump parts to the sink for midnight washing. Also use it for midnight diaper changes etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K

customer_reviews.title: Also great to play music through
customer_reviews.text: Soooo cute and soothing for night, and not just for kids/babies! Also great to play music through.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service! Cord to charge was missing. Very disappointing arrival. ...
customer_reviews.text: Cord to charge was missing. Very disappointing arrival. Cute item but now I can only use it for 6 hours before it becomes a paper weight. EDIT: After this review I was sent the cord, but as it was a gift it was still a let down and a lot of extra steps for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Works beautifully and looks so nice in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

product_meta.title: mamre Removable Rechargeable Motion Sensor Night Light, LED Stick-On Wall Light Rotation Spotlight Torch Nursery Lamp for Stairs Cabinet Hallway Closet, Petunias Warm White (2 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteWhy choose the Petunias Motion Sensor Night Light by Mamre?
- Not enough power outlets for night lights? Petunias is powered by rechargeable polymer lithium battery and very easy to install; more importantly, it will work (in AUTO Mode) almost half a year after a full charge. 
- Petunias can be separated from the amounting bracket to be used as a flashlight, and this feature is convenient for night activities likes feeding babies, changing diaper, going toilet or searching for something.
- Ordinary night lights are usually mounted on the place near the baseboard to lighten the floor. Petunias is more flexible and brighter, rotatable design provides more lighting angles; So that it can be fixed on the top of the door frame or higher to brighten a larger space. 

Specifications: 
- Power Input: DC5V / 500MA; Light Wattage: 1w, 8 LEDs; Lumens: 26-28; Light Color: Warm White 3000-3500K; Battery Capacity: 800mAh lithium battery; Charging Time: 2h; Continuous Working Time: 7h; Sensor: Light sensor & motion sensor; Sensor Range: 9ft-16ft / 3m-4m; Auto Off: 25s; Dimensions: 3.1*2.8*2.6in / 8*7*6.5cm; Weight: 2.1oz / 60g.

What's in the box? 
- 2 Petunias sensor lights, 2 mounting brackets, 2 USB cables, 2 double-sided foam tapes, 1 user manual.

All mamre products are backed by a 1 year warranty. If you are not completely satisfied, we will give your money back.

Order yours now RISK-FREE!
feature_bullets: - Smart & Thoughtful: AUTO on when motion is sensed within 9-12 feet in the dark and off after 25 seconds of inactivity. Or choose ON mode to use constant lighting.
- Removable & Adjustable: Lamp can be separated from the base to be used as a flashlight; Change illuminate with your convenient direction by 360° swiveling design.

- Long Battery Life & Brighter: A two-hour charge provides 7 hours of continuous lighting or 150+ days of automatic working; 26 lumen is bright enough for a short reading, diaper changing or searching for clothes in the wardrobe.
- Many Uses: Kitchen or bedroom or bathroom, dresser or cradle or bookshelf, sticks it on wherever a little illumination is needed.
- What will you have: 2 Petunias sensor lights, 2 USB cables, 2 double sided foam tapes, 1 user manual, and 1 year warranty.
